languages.text: {n}Его лицо становится непроницаемым, но голос обжигает холодом.{/n} "Я понял вас, {name}. Своим решением вы передаете целую планету в дар Архиврагу, и я буду вынужден уведомить Лорд-инквизитора о произошедшем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Его лицо становится непроницаемым, но голос обжигает холодом.{/n} "Я понял вас, {name}. Своим решением вы передаете целую планету в дар Архиврагу, и я буду вынужден уведомить Лорд-инквизитора о произошедшем".

languages.text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."
languages.original_text: {n}Его лицо становится непроницаемым, но голос обжигает холодом.{/n} "Я понял вас, {name}. Своим решением вы передаете целую планету в дар Архиврагу, и я буду вынужден уведомить Лорд-инквизитора о произошедшем".

traits.locale_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

{n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

{n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

{n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

{n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

{n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se torna impenetrable y, su voz, fría como el hielo.{/n} «Entiendo, {name}. Con esta decisión, lo que está haciendo es entregar un planeta entero al archienemigo. Me veo en la obligación de informar al Lord Inquisidor de lo ocurrido».
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se torna impenetrable y, su voz, fría como el hielo.{/n} «Entiendo, {name}. Con esta decisión, lo que está haciendo es entregar un planeta entero al archienemigo. Me veo en la obligación de informar al Lord Inquisidor de lo ocurrido».

languages.text: {n}彼の表情は変わらないが、声は冷たく響いた。{/n}「分かりました、{name}。この決断によって、惑星全体が渾沌の勢力に引き渡ることになります。そして、私にはこの出来事をロード・インクィジターに報告する義務があります」
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の表情は変わらないが、声は冷たく響いた。{/n}「分かりました、{name}。この決断によって、惑星全体が渾沌の勢力に引き渡ることになります。そして、私にはこの出来事をロード・インクィジターに報告する義務があります」

languages.text: {n}他的表情变得难以捉摸，但声音却带着冰冷的怒意。{/n}“我明白了，{name}。你做出了这样的决定，等于把整颗行星交到了混沌大敌手中。恐怕我不得不将这里发生的事情汇报给大审判官。”
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的表情变得难以捉摸，但声音却带着冰冷的怒意。{/n}“我明白了，{name}。你做出了这样的决定，等于把整颗行星交到了混沌大敌手中。恐怕我不得不将这里发生的事情汇报给大审判官。”

languages.text: {n}Seine Miene ist undurchdringlich, seine Stimme eiskalt.{/n} "Ich verstehe, {name}. Mit Eurer Entscheidung überlasst Ihr einen ganzen Planeten dem Erzfeind, und ich habe die Pflicht, den Großinquisitor über die Geschehnisse in Kenntnis zu setzen."
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Miene ist undurchdringlich, seine Stimme eiskalt.{/n} "Ich verstehe, {name}. Mit Eurer Entscheidung überlasst Ihr einen ganzen Planeten dem Erzfeind, und ich habe die Pflicht, den Großinquisitor über die Geschehnisse in Kenntnis zu setzen."

languages.text: {n}Son expression se fait impénétrable.{/n} « Je comprends, {name}, {n}rétorque-t-il d'une voix glaciale.{/n} Votre décision condamne une planète tout entière à tomber entre les mains du Grand Ennemi, et je serai dans l'obligation d'en informer le seigneur inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son expression se fait impénétrable.{/n} « Je comprends, {name}, {n}rétorque-t-il d'une voix glaciale.{/n} Votre décision condamne une planète tout entière à tomber entre les mains du Grand Ennemi, et je serai dans l'obligation d'en informer le seigneur inquisiteur. »

languages.text: {n}Yüzüne anlaşılamaz bir ifade çökse de sesindeki soğukluk, içine buz gibi işliyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum {name}. Verdiğin kararla tüm gezegeni Şerbaşı'nın ellerine bırakıyorsun. Ben de yaşananları Lord Engizisyoncu'ya bildirmekle yükümlüyüm."
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes impenetrable, but his voice burns cold.{/n} "I understand, {name}. With your decision, you are handing an entire planet over to the Archenemy, and I will be obliged to notify the Lord Inquisitor of what has happened."
